typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CKUN_DIM_KUNDE_SK as string,
		CKUN_MANDT as string,
		CKUN_KUNNR as string,
		CKUN_ANRED as string,
		CKUN_ADRNR as string,
		CKUN_NAME1 as string,
		CKUN_MCOD1 as string,
		CKUN_MCOD3 as string,
		CKUN_TELF1 as string,
		CKUN_LAND1 as string,
		CKUN_STRAS as string,
		CKUN_PSTLZ as string,
		CKUN_ORT01 as string,
		CKUN_ORT02 as string,
		CKUN_REGIO as string,
		CKUN_HASHKEY_BK as string,
		CKUN_HASHKEY_DATA as string,
		CKUN_CREATED_ON as string,
		CKUN_SOURCE as string,
		CKUN_VALID_FROM as string,
		CKUN_VALID_TO as string,
		CKUN_CURRENT_FLAG as string,
		CKUN_DML_STRAT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM CORE.DIM_KUNDE',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceCoreDim
sourceCoreDim derive(CKUN_DIM_KUNDE_SK = 0,
		CKUN_MANDT = toInteger(CKUN_MANDT),
		CKUN_KUNNR = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_ANRED = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_ADRNR = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_NAME1 = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_MCOD1 = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_MCOD3 = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_TELF1 = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_LAND1 = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_STRAS = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_PSTLZ = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_ORT01 = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_ORT02 = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_REGIO = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_HASHKEY_BK = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_HASHKEY_DATA = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_CREATED_ON = toDate('29991231 00:00:00.0000000'),
		CKUN_SOURCE = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_VALID_FROM = toDate('29991231 00:00:00.0000000'),
		CKUN_VALID_TO = toDate('29991231 00:00:00.0000000'),
		CKUN_CURRENT_FLAG = 'DUMMY',
		CKUN_DML_STRAT = 'DUMMY') ~> ChangeDatatypeKunde
ChangeDatatypeKunde select(mapColumn(
		CKUN_DIM_KUNDE_SK,
		CKUN_MANDT,
		CKUN_KUNNR,
		CKUN_ANRED,
		CKUN_ADRNR,
		CKUN_NAME1,
		CKUN_MCOD1,
		CKUN_MCOD3,
		CKUN_TELF1,
		CKUN_LAND1,
		CKUN_STRAS,
		CKUN_PSTLZ,
		CKUN_ORT01,
		CKUN_ORT02,
		CKUN_REGIO,
		CKUN_HASHKEY_BK,
		CKUN_HASHKEY_DATA,
		CKUN_CREATED_ON,
		CKUN_SOURCE,
		CKUN_VALID_FROM,
		CKUN_VALID_TO,
		CKUN_CURRENT_FLAG,
		CKUN_DML_STRAT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> orderCol
orderCol sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE CORE.DIM_KUNDE'],
	postSQLs:['	   INSERT INTO [CORE].[DIM_KUNDE]\n           ([CKUN_DIM_KUNDE_SK]\n		   ,[CKUN_MANDT]\n           ,[CKUN_KUNNR]\n           ,[CKUN_ANRED]\n           ,[CKUN_ADRNR]\n           ,[CKUN_NAME1]\n           ,[CKUN_MCOD1]\n           ,[CKUN_MCOD3]\n           ,[CKUN_TELF1]\n           ,[CKUN_LAND1]\n           ,[CKUN_STRAS]\n           ,[CKUN_PSTLZ]\n           ,[CKUN_ORT01]\n           ,[CKUN_ORT02]\n           ,[CKUN_REGIO]\n           ,[CKUN_HASHKEY_BK]\n           ,[CKUN_HASHKEY_DATA]\n           ,[CKUN_CREATED_ON]\n           ,[CKUN_SOURCE]\n		   ,[CKUN_VALID_FROM]\n		   ,[CKUN_VALID_TO]\n		   ,[CKUN_CURRENT_FLAG]\n		   ,[CKUN_DML_STRAT])\n     VALUES\n           (0\n		   ,999\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'29991231 00:00:00.0000000\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n		   ,\'29991231 00:00:00.0000000\'\n		   ,\'29991231 00:00:00.0000000\'\n		   ,\'Y\'\n		   ,\'DUMMY\')'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> coreDummyDim
